column4: the file doesn't show up on my vista computer even with fat32 format AND renaming the file to something else

I'm copying over a .rar file to a flash drive, and when I put it in my vista computer, the .rar doesn't show up. When I put it back in my comp running ubuntu, it's there. What might cause  this? even renaming the file doesn't help
not properly unmounting it is your problem ;)
